title: CiviReform Kit — Post‑Capture Government Recovery Playbook
summary: Rapid, staged reboot for ministries after institutional capture: forensic inventory, integrity triage, staffed caretaker lanes, policy-as-code guardrails, and citizen audit loops using CoCivium primitives.
rationale: When agencies are hollowed or politicized, incoming stewards need a standard, non‑partisan recovery path that is fast, auditable, and resistant to re‑capture.
impact: Shortens time-to-function for critical services, rebuilds public trust through transparent checkpoints, and hardens org memory against future coercion.
